reviewText:
Don't bother! We have over 1000 VHS and DVDs of trains, so I've seen lots of train videos. Way to long on segment that show nothing but ballast passing under the camera and other such "scenes"
Save your money...Really disappointed in Pentrex on this one! The good points are no jarring music with a 20 second loop, it was cheap. Call me next week to see if I can think of another good point! There is minimal narration. To call this tape thrilling is a huge mistake. Pentrex I KNOW you can do better than this because you have!
